chunk_prompt: Summarize the following discussion about relationship dating partner into 2-3 clear, complete sentences:
final_prompt: Create a coherent 2-3 sentence summary about relationship dating partner. Focus on the most important information and ensure it flows well:

sentences.text: Wedding planning often reveals deeper issues in relationships because it involves money, family dynamics, personal values, and the ability to problem-solve together.
r/relationship_advice - My (28F) boyfriend (30M) refuses to compromise on our wedding plans.
If he regularly dismisses your opinions and preferences, you might want to reconsider the whole relationship, not just the wedding plans.
His response to that suggestion will tell you a lot about how he views conflict resolution in your relationship.

chunks.raw_summary: Wedding planning often reveals deeper issues in relationships because it involves money, family dynamics, personal values and the ability to problem-solve together . If he regularly dismisses your opinions and preferences, you might want to reconsider the whole relationship, not just the wedding plans .
